name: ChalkTalk
0:
”Alexa, tell chalk talk to send a message”
”Alexa, tell chalk talk to read my messages”
”Alexa, tell chalk talk send a sound message”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chalk talk
des:
ChalkTalk is a cross platform chat service that enables you to chat with other platforms such as other Amazon Echoes, Google Homes, iOS or Android devices.

It's quick and easy to setup - 

1. Download the 'ChalkTalk Messenger' companion app either on the Apple App Store or on the Google Play store and create an account.
2. Use the Amazon Alexa App to link your account.
3. Add some friends and contacts.

From then on, you can send messages or check your messages on your Amazon Echo!

It's safe and secure:
'ChalkTalk Messenger' uses direct asynchronous/real-time messages between users within the platform only. There are no additional outside numbers required; your phone number is required so your friends and contacts can find you to connect with. You can accept or decline any contact invites. You will only be able to message people that are within your connected contacts.
